item.title: Racket: Wiring it up to a REPL ala SLIME/Swank
item.description: One of the awesome things about working with clojure is that it’s possible to wire up clojure files in emacs to a REPL by making use of Slime/Swank. I’ve started using Racketto work through the examples in The Little Schemerand wanted to achieve a similar thing there. I don’t know much about configuring emacs so I made use of Phil Halgelberg’s emacs-starter-kit which is available on github. On my travels I came across this video describing how to do exactly what I wanted.
